content:
In Microsoft Excel, you can open the "Format Cells" dialog in a few different ways:

1. Right-click on the cell and select "Format Cells..." from the context menu.
2. Select the cell, then press "Ctrl + 1" on your keyboard.
3. Select the cell, then go to the "Home" tab on the ribbon, click on the "Number Format" drop-down list, and select "Format Cells...".
